scripts.build:all: bun run build:models && bun run build:core && bun run build:web && bun run build:vscode
scripts.clean:all: bun run clean:models && bun run clean:core && bun run clean:web
scripts.deploy:major: bun run bump:major && bun build:all && bun run publish:all
scripts.deploy:minor: bun run bump:minor && bun build:all && bun run publish:all
scripts.deploy:patch: bun run bump:patch && bun build:all && bun run publish:all
scripts.lint:all: bun run lint:models && bun run lint:core && bun run lint:web
scripts.lint:core: cd packages/core && bun run format && bun run lint
scripts.lint:models: cd packages/models && bun run format && bun run lint
scripts.lint:web: cd apps/web && bun run format && bun run lint
scripts.publish:all: git add . && git commit -m "v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push && cd vscode-ext && vsce publish
